def HalfDiagonalSums ( mat , n ) :
    diag1_left = 0
    diag1_right = 0
    diag2_left = 0
    diag2_right = 0
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    while i < n :
        if ( i < n // 2 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((2 > 0) or (2 < 0))):
            diag1_left += mat [ i ] [ i ]
            diag2_left += mat [ j ] [ i ]
        elif ( i > n // 2 ) :
            diag1_right += mat [ i ] [ i ]
            diag2_right += mat [ j ] [ i ]
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return ( diag1_left == diag2_right and diag2_right == diag2_left and diag1_right == diag2_left and diag2_right == mat [ n // 2 ] [ n // 2 ] )

def checkDivisibility ( num ) :
    length = len ( num )
    if ( length == 1 and num [ 0 ] == '0' ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((4 > 0) or (4 < 0))):
        return True
    if ( length % 3 == 1 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((8 > 4) or (8 < 4))):
        num = str ( num ) + "00"
        length += 2
    elif ( length % 3 == 2 ) :
        num = str ( num ) + "0"
        length += 1
    sum = 0
    p = 1
    for i in range ( length - 1 , - 1 , - 3 ) :
        group = 0
        group += ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' )
        i -= 1
        group += ( ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' ) ) * 10
        i -= 1
        group += ( ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' ) ) * 100
        sum = sum + group * p
        p *= ( - 1 )
    sum = abs ( sum )
    return ( sum % 13 == 0 )

def isdivisible7 ( num ) :
    n = len ( num )
    if ( n == 0 and num [ 0 ] == '\n' ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((10 > 3) or (10 < 3))):
        return 1
    if ( n % 3 == 1 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((2 > 0) or (2 < 0))):
        num = str ( num ) + "00"
        n += 2
    elif ( n % 3 == 2 ) :
        num = str ( num ) + "0"
        n += 1
    GSum = 0
    p = 1
    for i in range ( n - 1 , - 1 , - 1 ) :
        group = 0
        group += ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' )
        i -= 1
        group += ( ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' ) ) * 10
        i -= 1
        group += ( ord ( num [ i ] ) - ord ( '0' ) ) * 100
        GSum = GSum + group * p
        p *= ( - 1 )
    return ( GSum % 7 == 0 )

def decimalToBinary ( num , k_prec ) :
    binary = ""
    Integral = int ( num )
    fractional = num - Integral
    while ( Integral > 0 ) :
        rem = Integral % 2
        binary += str ( rem )
        Integral //= 2
    binary = binary [ : : - 1 ]
    binary += '.'
    while ( k_prec > 0 ) :
        fractional *= 2
        fract_bit = int ( fractional )
        if ( fract_bit == 1 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((10 > 8) or (10 < 8))):
            fractional -= fract_bit
            binary += '1'
        else :
            binary += '0'
        k_prec -= 1
    return binary

def countOfBinaryNumberLessThanN ( N ) :
    q = collections . deque ( )
    q.append ( 1 )
    cnt = 0
    while ( q ) :
        t = q.popleft ( )
        if ( t <= N ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((5 > 2) or (5 < 2))):
            cnt = cnt + 1
            q.append ( t * 10 )
            q.append ( t * 10 + 1 )
    return cnt

def findDiff ( arr , n ) :
    arr.sort ( )
    count = 0
    max_count = 0
    min_count = n
    for i in range ( 0 , ( n - 1 ) ) :
        if arr [ i ] == arr [ i + 1 ] and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((5 > 1) or (5 < 1))):
            count += 1
            continue
        else :
            max_count = max ( max_count , count )
            min_count = min ( min_count , count )
            count = 0
    return max_count - min_count

def longDivision ( number , divisor ) :
    ans = ""
    idx = 0
    temp = ord ( number [ idx ] ) - ord ( '0' )
    while ( temp < divisor ) :
        temp = ( temp * 10 + ord ( number [ idx + 1 ] ) - ord ( '0' ) )
        idx += 1
    while ( ( len ( number ) ) > idx ) :
        ans += chr ( math.floor ( temp // divisor ) + ord ( '0' ) )
        temp = ( ( temp % divisor ) * 10 + ord ( number [ idx + 1 ] ) - ord ( '0' ) )
        idx += 1
    ans += chr ( math.floor ( temp // divisor ) + ord ( '0' ) )
    if ( len ( ans ) == 0 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((3 > 2) or (3 < 2))):
        return "0"
    return ans

def evenFibSum ( limit ) :
    if ( limit < 2 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((8 > 0) or (8 < 0))):
        return 0
    ef1 = 0
    ef2 = 2
    sm = ef1 + ef2
    while ( ef2 <= limit ) :
        ef3 = 4 * ef2 + ef1
        if ( ef3 > limit ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((7 > 0) or (7 < 0))):
            break
        ef1 = ef2
        ef2 = ef3
        sm = sm + ef2
    return sm

def findIndex ( n ) :
    if ( n <= 1 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((3 > 2) or (3 < 2))):
        return n
    a = 0
    b = 1
    c = 1
    res = 1
    while ( c < n ) :
        c = a + b
        res = res + 1
        a = b
        b = c
    return res

def subArraySum ( arr , n , sum ) :
    curr_sum = arr [ 0 ]
    start = 0
    i = 1
    while i <= n :
        while curr_sum > sum and start < i - 1 :
            curr_sum = curr_sum - arr [ start ]
            start += 1
        if curr_sum == sum and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((7 > 2) or (7 < 2))):
            print ( "Sum found between indexes" )
            print ( "%d and %d" % ( start , i - 1 ) )
            return 1
        if i < n and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((4 > 1) or (4 < 1))):
            curr_sum = curr_sum + arr [ i ]
        i += 1
    print ( "No subarray found" )
    return 0

def sumofoddFactors ( n ) :
    res = 1
    while n % 2 == 0 :
        n = n // 2
    for i in range ( 3 , int ( math.sqrt ( n ) + 1 ) ) :
        count = 0
        curr_sum = 1
        curr_term = 1
        while n % i == 0 :
            count += 1
            n = n // i
            curr_term *= i
            curr_sum += curr_term
        res *= curr_sum
    if n >= 2 and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((5 > 0) or (5 < 0))):
        res *= ( 1 + n )
    return res

def kth ( arr1 , arr2 , m , n , k ) :
    sorted1 = [ 0 ] * ( m + n )
    i = 0
    j = 0
    d = 0
    while ( i < m and j < n ) :
        if ( arr1 [ i ] < arr2 [ j ] ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((4 > 2) or (4 < 2))):
            sorted1 [ d ] = arr1 [ i ]
            i += 1
        else :
            sorted1 [ d ] = arr2 [ j ]
            j += 1
        d += 1
    while ( i < m ) :
        sorted1 [ d ] = arr1 [ i ]
        d += 1
        i += 1
    while ( j < n ) :
        sorted1 [ d ] = arr2 [ j ]
        d += 1
        j += 1
    return sorted1 [ k - 1 ]

        i -= 1

        return False

        j += 1
    str = list ( str )
    temp = str [ i - 1 ]
    str [ i - 1 ] = str [ j ]
    str [ j ] = temp
    str = ''.join ( str )
    str [ : : - 1 ]
    return True

def snoob ( x ) :
    next = 0
    if ( x ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((2 > 0) or (2 < 0))):
        rightOne = x & - ( x )
        nextHigherOneBit = x + int ( rightOne )
        rightOnesPattern = x ^ int ( nextHigherOneBit )
        rightOnesPattern = ( int ( rightOnesPattern ) / int ( rightOne ) )
        rightOnesPattern = int ( rightOnesPattern ) >> 2
        next = nextHigherOneBit | rightOnesPattern
    return next

def minimumSquare ( a , b ) :
    result = 0
    rem = 0
    if ( a < b ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((8 > 1) or (8 < 1))):
        a , b = b , a
    while ( b > 0 ) :
        result += int ( a / b )
        rem = int ( a % b )
        a = b
        b = rem
    return result

def isPrime ( p ) :
    checkNumber = 2 ** p - 1
    nextval = 4 % checkNumber
    for i in range ( 1 , p - 1 ) :
        nextval = ( nextval * nextval - 2 ) % checkNumber
    if ( nextval == 0 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((3 > 0) or (3 < 0))): return True
    else : return False

def remainderWith7 ( num ) :
    series = [ 1 , 3 , 2 , - 1 , - 3 , - 2 ]
    series_index = 0
    result = 0
    for i in range ( ( len ( num ) - 1 ) , - 1 , - 1 ) :
        digit = ord ( num [ i ] ) - 48
        result += digit * series [ series_index ]
        series_index = ( series_index + 1 ) % 6
        result %= 7
    if ( result < 0 ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((9 > 8) or (9 < 8))):
        result = ( result + 7 ) % 7
    return result

def seriesSum ( n ) :
    i = 1
    res = 0.0
    sign = True
    while ( n > 0 ) :
        n = n - 1
        if ( sign ) and (((True or False) and (False or True)) and ((3 > 2) or (3 < 2))):
            sign = False
            res = res + ( i + 1 ) / ( i + 2 )
            i = i + 2
        else :
            sign = True
            res = res - ( i + 1 ) / ( i + 2 )
            i = i + 2
    return res
